dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2544 EH: Securing the U.S. Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To improve the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing the U.S. Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network Act.
Section 372 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 274) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking The Secretary shall by contract and inserting In general—The Secretary shall;
by striking establishment and and inserting continued; and

by striking the second and third sentences and inserting The Secretary may award grants, contracts, or cooperative agreements, as the Secretary determines appropriate, for purposes of carrying out this section.; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking (b)(1) The Organ Procurement and all that follows through the end of subparagraph (A) of paragraph (1) and inserting the following:
The Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network shall—

subparagraph.text: be operated through awards to public or private entities made by the Secretary that are distinct from the awards made to support the organization tasked with supporting the board of directors described in subparagraph (B); and

section.text: Title III of the Public Health Service Act is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 371(b)(1)(H)(i)(III) (42 U.S.C. 273(b)(1)(H)(i)(III)), by striking histocompatability and inserting histocompatibility;
in section 374(c)(2) (42 U.S.C. 274b(c)(2)), by striking section 371 or 373 each place it appears and inserting section 371, 372, or 373;

subparagraph.text: by striking the comma at the end of each of paragraphs (1) and (2) and inserting a semicolon;
in paragraph (3), by striking transplants, and and inserting transplants; and; and
in paragraph (4), by redesignating clauses (i) and (ii) as subparagraphs (A) and (B), respectively; and

by striking February 10 of 1991 and of each second year thereafter and inserting 2 years after the date of enactment of the Securing the U.S. Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network Act and every second year thereafter; and
by striking Committee on Labor and Human Resources of the Senate. and inserting Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate,.

section.text: Not later than 2 years after the date of enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall—

paragraph.text: to the extent data are available, conduct a review of the historical financing of the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network described in section 372 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 274), including the utilization of registration fees among entities that have previously been awarded contracts under such section 372; and

submit to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions and the Committee on Finance of the Senate and the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives a report on the review under paragraph (1), including related recommendations, as applicable.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 25, 2023.
